title: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline

reasoning.problem: Establish Formal Inbox Document Processing Pipeline. The influx of PDF documents presents valuable information, but currently lacks a streamlined process for extraction, indexing, and storage, hindering effective knowledge integration. This petition seeks to authorize the creation of a documented pipeline for inbox processing, utilizing tools to extract text, index content for search, and store information within the Librarian agent.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
